code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

eventTypeIds.description: max of 10 event types. IDs here belong to the EventType. For example, if requesting CAMPAGIN as the eventType, these are campaignIds.

filters.description:
| Filter | Entity Types |
||-|
| BUDGET_AMOUNT | CAMPAIGN |
| IN_BUDGET | CAMPAIGN |
| STATUS | CAMPAIGN, AD_GROUP, AD, KEYWORD, PRODUCT_TARGET, NEGATIVE_KEYWORD |
| END_DATE | CAMPAIGN |
| START_DATE | CAMPAIGN |
| PLACEMENT_GROUP | CAMPAIGN|
| SMART_BIDDING_STRATEGY | CAMPAIGN |
| BID_AMOUNT | AD_GROUP |
| NAME | CAMPAIGN, AD_GROUP |

useProfileIdAdvertiser.description: If true, retrieves events which belong to the associated advertiser

changeType.description:
ChangeTypes for EntityTypes
| EntityType | Valid Change Types |
||--|
|CAMPAIGN | STATUS, IN_BUDGET, PORTFOLIO, BUDGET_AMOUNT, NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, SMART_BIDDING_STRATEGY, PLACEMENT_GROUP, CREATED, IS_PREMIUM_BID_ENABLED, PORTFOLIO_ID, BUDGET_DOCUMENT_VERSION, IS_PROCESSING, RULE_BASED_BUDGET_VALUE, APPLICABLE_RULE_NAME, APPLICABLE_RULE_ID, CREATION_DATE, AUTO_TARGETED |
|AD_GROUP | STATUS, NAME, DEFAULT_BID_AMOUNT|
|AD | STATUS|
|KEYWORD | STATUS, BID_AMOUNT|
|PRODUCT_TARGETING | STATUS, BID_AMOUNT|
|NEGATIVE_KEYWORD | STATUS|

keyword.description: Field only for keywords or negative keywords. The keyword or phrase this matches.

placementGroupPosition.description: Field only for campaign placement group change types

targetingExpression.description:
Field only for Product Targeting where type = EXPRESSION. Some examples:
category="Car Seat Canopies & Covers" brand="Munchkin" price<14.9 rating>4.6
asin="B000NPPATS"
category="Women's Handbag Accessories"

info.description: Provides information about changes made to campaigns, adgroups, ads, etc
info.title: Change history

post.description:
Returns history of changes for provided event sources that match the filters and time ranges specified. Only events that belong to the authenticated Advertiser can be queried. All times will be in UTC Epoch format. This API accepts identifiers in either the alphamumeric format (default), or the numeric format. If numeric IDs are supplied, then numeric IDs will be returned otherwise, alphanumeric IDs are returned. This API only returns change history for Sponsored Products and Sponsored Brands campaigns. Changes for Sponsored Display campaigns are not returned.  Also, it doesn't return information about who made the change.

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit","advertiser_campaign_view"]

count.description: Requested number of results. Default 100. Minimum 50. Maximum 200.

nextToken.description: token from previous response to get next set of data.

pageOffset.description: Mutually exclusive with 'nextToken'. Max results with pageOffset is 10000. Use nextToken instead for more results.

nextToken.description: returned if not using pageOffset. Can be used in the request to request the next set of results.

totalResults.description: total results matching the query. Only provided for pageOffset queries and capped at 10000.

200.description: Successful query. Result contains historical events matching query

401.description: Unauthorized - Request failed because user is not authenticated or is not allowed to invoke the operation.

403.description: Forbidden - Request failed because user does not have access to a specified resource

429.description: Too Many Requests - Request was rate-limited. Retry later.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server. Retry later and report an error if unresolved.
